resources.string: Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question.\n\nIf you get the answer wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.

Android Trivia will help remind you of important concepts you have learned and will learn in Android development.

This is one of the projects created by tt89 :) and is yet to be completed.
